Class RacingAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • RacingAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RacingAnimationInterface

    public class RacingAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
implements RacingAnimationInterface
    Represents a collection of racing smiley faces that race one another, each completing a set number of laps
    Author:
    Stephen Em and Jenny Tang
